subject: Soccer
Coaches and Managers
organizations: New York City Football Club (Soccer Team)
lead_paragraph: The French World Cup winner, plucked from a developmental role with Manchester City, will take over at N.Y.C.F.C. on Jan. 1, the team said.
snippet: The French World Cup winner, plucked from a developmental role with Manchester City, will take over at N.Y.C.F.C. on Jan. 1, the team said.
